scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && pnpm dev" "cd apps/web && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && pnpm build" "cd apps/web && pnpm build"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && pnpm start" "cd apps/web && pnpm preview"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && pnpm tsc --noEmit" "cd apps/web && pnpm tsc --noEmit"
